org.fujion.model

Interface IPaginator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Paginator

    public interface IPaginator
    Supports paging within a list model.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IPaginator.IPagingListener
      Interface for listeners receiving events when a setting is modified.
      static class  IPaginator.PagingEventType
      Type of property change.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addEventListener(IPaginator.IPagingListener listener)
      Register a listener to receive events when a setting changes.
      int getCurrentPage()
      Returns the index of the current page.
      int getMaxPage()
      Returns the index of the last page.
      int getModelSize()
      Returns the size of the model.
      int getPageSize()
      Returns the number of model objects in a single page.
      default boolean hasNext()
      Returns true if a previous page exists.
      default boolean hasPrevious()
      Returns true if a previous page exists.
      default boolean isDisabled()
      Returns true if paging is disabled.
      void removeAllListeners()
      Removes all listeners.
      boolean removeEventListener(IPaginator.IPagingListener listener)
      Removes a single event listener.
      void setCurrentPage(int currentPage)
      Sets the index of the current page.
      void setPageSize(int pageSize)
      Sets the number of model objects in a single page.

    • Method Detail

      • getPageSize

        int getPageSize()
        Returns the number of model objects in a single page. A value of <= 0 means that paging is disabled.
        Returns:
        The page size.

      • setPageSize

        void setPageSize(int pageSize)
        Sets the number of model objects in a single page. A value of <= 0 disabled paging.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - The page size.

      • getCurrentPage

        int getCurrentPage()
        Returns the index of the current page. Will always return 0 if paging is disabled.
        Returns:
        The current page.

      • setCurrentPage

        void setCurrentPage(int currentPage)
        Sets the index of the current page. Has no effect if paging is disabled.
        Parameters:
        currentPage - Index of the page to become the current page.

      • getModelSize

        int getModelSize()
        Returns the size of the model.
        Returns:
        Size of the model.

      • getMaxPage

        int getMaxPage()
        Returns the index of the last page. Will always return 0 if paging is disabled.
        Returns:
        Index of the last page.

      • addEventListener

        boolean addEventListener(IPaginator.IPagingListener listener)
        Register a listener to receive events when a setting changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.
        Returns:
        True if the listener was registered. False if already registered.

      • removeAllListeners

        void removeAllListeners()
        Removes all listeners.

      • removeEventListener

        boolean removeEventListener(IPaginator.IPagingListener listener)
        Removes a single event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the listener was removed. False if it was not registered.

      • isDisabled

        default boolean isDisabled()
        Returns true if paging is disabled.
        Returns:
        True if paging is disabled.

      • hasPrevious

        default boolean hasPrevious()
        Returns true if a previous page exists. Will always return false if paging is disabled.
        Returns:
        True if a previous page exists.

      • hasNext

        default boolean hasNext()
        Returns true if a previous page exists. Will always return false if paging is disabled.
        Returns:
        True if a previous page exists.
